name: "Death Has A Shadow" Quiz Challenge - How Much Do You Know? | 'Family Guy' Seasons/Episodes

questions.text: In the very beginning of the episode, what TV show are the Griffins watching?
questions.explanation:
The Brady Bunch.

	On "The Brady Bunch", Greg is found with cigarettes and is sent to the snake pit, and Jan is sent to the chamber of fire for tattling on her brother.

questions.text: What ice cream flavour does Peter get drunk from?
questions.explanation:
Butter Rum.

	Peter says the ice cream is his favourite and licks it once before immediately passing out on a table.

questions.text: How many beers does Peter drink at the stag party?
questions.explanation:
37.

	Peter drinks thirty-seven beers at the party and ends up passing out on the table.  Lois decides to serve breakfast while he's on the table.

questions.text: Which dangerously packaged toy was not shown on the Channel Five News?
questions.explanation:
Baby Smokes-A-Lot.

	All of the dangerous toys were supposed to be monitored by Peter, but he fell asleep at the assembly line.  Baby Smokes-A-Lot will appear in a later episode called "Mr. Griffin Goes To Washington".

questions.text: When Peter gets fired, he applies for a job as a mascot for what cereal?
questions.explanation:
Cocoa Puffs.

	Peter goes through twenty-six takes of saying "I'm Coo-coo for Cocoa Puffs" incorrectly before applying for a job as a sneeze guard.  That job was also unsuccessful.

questions.text: Which thing does Peter not buy for a family member after he gets $150,000 from Welfare?
questions.explanation:
A car.

	Peter gives Meg the Collagen, the whole family a moat, and he gives Lois the jester because he thinks she should be treated like a queen.

questions.text: What Superbowl is featured in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Thirty-three.

	This episode was aired immediately following Superbowl XXXIII in 1999.  Peter flys a blimp over the Superbowl stadium and gives back welfare money to the taxpayers to apologize to Lois.

questions.text: Who persuades the judge to remove Peter's twenty-four months of sentence?
questions.explanation:
Stewie.

	Upon realising Peter has a small son, the judge lets Peter go free.  Lois tries to persuade the judge but is sentenced along with Peter.

questions.text: Does Quagmire appear in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Quagmire appears both at the stag party, and at the courthouse.  He only appears with lines at the stag party.

questions.text: Does Cleveland appear in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Cleveland doesn't appear with a speaking part on the show for a few more episodes, but you can see him sitting in the courtroom where Peter's trial is occurring.
